SummaryEnglish: Shinichi Sakurai’s one wish is for a little peace and quiet. But Hana Uzaki — his boisterous, well-endowed underclassman — has other plans. All she wants is to hang out and poke fun at him. With the help of her chipper charm and peppy persistence, this might just be the start of a beautiful relationship!

1.TitleEnglish: AT-X Special Program: Uzaki-chan Wants to Play with AR!

1.SummaryEnglish: University student Shinichi Sakurai is comfortable being an introverted loner and doesn’t care what others think. Buxom underclassmen Hana Uzaki doesn’t understand this one bit. A tornado of joy, she’s taken it upon herself to make him more social. Starting to enjoy her company, he’d concede that they’re friends. Can it be possible to have as much fun with another person as he would by himself?
College junior Shinichi Sakurai just wants to be alone, but loudmouthed sophomore Hana Uzaki sees it as her mission to keep him from being lonely.

2.TitleEnglish: The Café Owner Wants a Glimpse
2.SummaryEnglish: Uzaki visits the café where Sakurai works, much to his dismay. An encounter with a cat goes horribly awry. Sakurai eats lunch with an actual friend.

3.TitleEnglish: The Asai Family Wants to Look Out for Us!
3.SummaryEnglish: Turns out the café-owner's daughter Ami loves people-watching, too. Sakurai comes down with a really bad cold. Uzaki has a big request for her senior.

4.TitleEnglish: I Want to Hang Out Together Over the Holiday!
4.SummaryEnglish: Uzaki tries to get Sakurai out of the house over the extended Golden Week holiday. A crowded train takes Sakurai someplace he doesn't want to go.

5.TitleEnglish: I Want to Meddle in My Friend's Business!
5.SummaryEnglish: Sakurai's friend is determined to get him and Uzaki together, but meets resistance from an unusual place. Uzaki has some thoughts about choco-mint.

6.TitleEnglish: Summer! The Beach! I Want to Test My Courage!
6.SummaryEnglish: Uzaki starts her part-time job. Sakaki orchestrates a summer getaway for the four friends, including a fun day at the beach and a spooky night walk.

7.TitleEnglish: I Want to Hang Out at a Cat Café and a Pub!
7.SummaryEnglish: Sakurai asks Uzaki to join him cuddling friendly felines at a cat café. Uzaki asks Sakurai to accompany her to a pub for drinks on her 20th birthday.

8.TitleEnglish: I Want to Watch Fireworks Together!
8.SummaryEnglish: The café owner and Ami encourage Sakurai to take a downhearted Uzaki to a fireworks festival in an attempt to get things back to normal between them.

9.SummaryEnglish: Sakurai meets Uzaki's mother, who's surprised to learn some basic facts about him. A sudden change in personality leaves Uzaki's coworkers befuddled.

10.TitleEnglish: I Want to Hang Out in Tottori!
10.SummaryEnglish: An innocent trip to Tottori soon becomes a calculated effort to turn Sakurai and Uzaki into a full-fledged couple. After all, Tottori is for lovers!

11.TitleEnglish: Does Sakurai Want to Hang Out, Too?
11.SummaryEnglish: Sakurai makes Uzaki clean up her stuff, then takes cooking lessons from her mom. A solo karaoke trip spirals out of control and ends in disaster.

12.TitleEnglish: Uzaki-chan Wants to Hang Out More!
12.SummaryEnglish: Uzaki reminisces about her time with Sakurai in high school, then cooks up a scheme to see what he's like when he's drunk as summer comes to an end.

2.SummaryEnglish: During the summer holidays, energetic Hana Uzaki spent most of her time accompanying her lonesome upperclassman, Shinichi Sakurai. Now that school has resumed, Uzaki's teasing continues to ramp up, much to Sakurai's constant annoyance. Nevertheless, no amount of ridicule can damage the pair's relationship—which only seems to be getting better as their college days fly by!

1.TitleEnglish: Uzaki-chan Wants to Hang Out, All Right!
1.SummaryEnglish: Sakaki invites Sakurai and Uzaki bowling, which turns into a full-fledged battle royale. Ami schemes to get the two into sexy uniforms at the café.

2.TitleEnglish: I Want to Make Udon After We Hang Out!
2.SummaryEnglish: A day out with Sakaki and Ami turns into a grudge match of futsal against a trio of bullies. Sakurai asks Uzaki's mom Tsuki to teach him a new dish.

3.TitleEnglish: Does Uzaki-chan Want to Go to the School Festival?
3.SummaryEnglish: Sakurai isn't feeling the school festival, but he and Uzaki go as a favor for Sakaki. A fortune-telling mix-up puts a spotlight on their relationship.

4.TitleEnglish: Uzaki-chan Wants to Be Number One!
4.SummaryEnglish: When Uzaki gets the wrong idea about Sakurai, Sakaki and Ami try to jump-start their stalled relationship. Sakurai reaches a new level with Hana.

5.TitleEnglish: The Whole Uzaki Clan Wants to Get Together!
5.SummaryEnglish: Ami gets to the root of Hana's bad mood. Sakurai meets an intense gym trainer. Hana's father calls a family meeting that quickly goes off the rails.

6.SummaryEnglish: Fujio vents about his daughter to a clueless Sakurai, who goes on to reach an overdue new level with Uzaki. The two celebrate Sakurai's 21st birthday.

7.SummaryEnglish: Uzaki comes up with a way to further endear herself to Sakurai, while little sister Yanagi concocts a plan to finally meet her big sister's senpai.

8.TitleEnglish: Yanagi and Kiri Want to Have Fun, Too!
8.SummaryEnglish: Sakurai has something like an epiphany about his resistance to using Uzaki's first name. Kiri looks to release pent-up energy during finals season.

9.SummaryEnglish: Fujio takes his wife and daughters to a hot-spring resort for some refreshing relaxation--and to repair the bond with Hana that he can feel weakening.

10.TitleEnglish: We Want a Thrill Before Christmas!
10.SummaryEnglish: Tensions are high between Sakurai and Hana as the lovers' holiday of Christmas approaches. Sakurai gets a shock when he touches base with his family.

11.TitleEnglish: I Kind of Want to Do Things Right Already!
11.SummaryEnglish: Hana reminisces about high school with Sakurai while his father warns him about their relationship. Sakurai gets solid advice from an unlikely source.

12.TitleEnglish: I Want to Hang Out on Christmas Eve, Too!
12.SummaryEnglish: It's Christmas Eve, and Hana finds a way to spend it with Sakurai at her home. He's introduced to her father Fujio, who knows him from somewhere...

13.TitleEnglish: I Want to Hang Out Together Next Year, Too!
13.SummaryEnglish: Christmas Eve at the Uzaki house comes to a confusing end for just about everyone involved, leading Sakurai to reexamine his feelings for his junior.
